problem_names:
lemma actPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   \<alpha> :: act

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<approx> \<alpha>.(Q)"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   R :: ccs

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma resPres: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   x :: name

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<approx> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "!P \<approx> !Q"
translations:
lemma actPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   \<alpha> :: act

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<approx> \<alpha>.(Q)"

proof (state)
this:
  (\<alpha>.P, \<alpha>.Q)
  \<in> {(\<alpha>.P, \<alpha>.Q) |P Q. P \<approx> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<alpha>.P \<approx> \<alpha>.Q
by(coinduct rule: weakBisimulationCoinduct) (auto dest: weakBisimulationE intro: actPres)

lemma parPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   R :: ccs

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R
let ?X = "{(P \<parallel> R, Q \<parallel> R) | P Q R. P \<approx> Q}"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
this:
  (P \<parallel> R, Q \<parallel> R)
  \<in> {(P \<parallel> R, Q \<parallel> R) |P Q R. P \<approx> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R

by(coinduct rule: weakBisimulationCoinduct, auto) 
      (blast intro: parPres dest: weakBisimulationE)+

proof (state)
this:
  P \<parallel> R \<approx> Q \<parallel> R

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma resPres: 
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs
  and   x :: name

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<approx> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q"
let ?X = "{(\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q) | x P Q. P \<approx> Q}"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q)
    \<in> {(\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q) |x P Q.
           P \<approx> Q}

proof (state)
this:
  (\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q)
  \<in> {(\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q) |x P Q.
         P \<approx> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<approx> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q)
  \<in> {(\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P, \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q) |x P Q.
         P \<approx> Q}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<approx> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q
by(coinduct rule: weakBisimulationCoinduct) (auto intro: resPres dest: weakBisimulationE)

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P :: ccs
  and   Q :: ccs

  assumes "P \<approx> Q"

  shows "!P \<approx> !Q"

proof (state)
this:
  R \<approx> T
  (P, Q) \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (P, Q) \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim
obtain P' Q' where "P \<approx> P'" and "(P', Q') \<in> ?X" and "Q' \<sim> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P' Q'.
        \<lbrakk>P \<approx> P'; (P', Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation;
         Q' \<sim> Q\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  P \<approx> P'
  (P', Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation
  Q' \<sim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<approx> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R \<parallel> P \<approx> R \<parallel> P'

proof (state)
this:
  R \<parallel> P \<approx> R \<parallel> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  R \<parallel> P \<approx> R \<parallel> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  R \<approx> T
  (P', Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

proof (prove)
using this:
  R \<approx> T
  (P', Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R \<parallel> P', T \<parallel> Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

proof (state)
this:
  (R \<parallel> P', T \<parallel> Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  (R \<parallel> P', T \<parallel> Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q' \<sim> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. T \<parallel> Q' \<sim> T \<parallel> Q

proof (state)
this:
  T \<parallel> Q' \<sim> T \<parallel> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (chain)
picking this:
  R \<parallel> P \<approx> R \<parallel> P'
  (R \<parallel> P', T \<parallel> Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation
  T \<parallel> Q' \<sim> T \<parallel> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  R \<parallel> P \<approx> R \<parallel> P'
  (R \<parallel> P', T \<parallel> Q') \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation
  T \<parallel> Q' \<sim> T \<parallel> Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R \<parallel> P, T \<parallel> Q)
    \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim

proof (state)
this:
  (R \<parallel> P, T \<parallel> Q)
  \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>?R2 \<approx> ?T2;
   (?Pa2, ?Qa2)
   \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?R2 \<parallel> ?Pa2, ?T2 \<parallel> ?Qa2)
                    \<in> weakBisimulation O
                          bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>?R2 \<approx> ?T2;
   (?Pa2, ?Qa2)
   \<in> weakBisimulation O bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?R2 \<parallel> ?Pa2, ?T2 \<parallel> ?Qa2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (prove)
using this:

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (!P, !Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

proof (state)
this:
  (!P, !Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (prove)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<approx> !Q

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P Q.
       (P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation \<Longrightarrow>
       P \<leadsto>\<^sup>^<(weakBisimulation O
                             bangRel weakBisimulation O bisim)> Q
 2. \<And>P Q.
       (P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation \<Longrightarrow>
       (Q, P) \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation

proof (state)
this:
  (P, Q) \<in> bangRel weakBisimulation
